name: Morphometric CT Quantification of Liver, Spleen, and Abdominal Fat
description: Volumetry and attenuation analysis of liver, spleen, visceral fat, and subcutaneous fat from CT images

attributes.name: Liver-spleen CT attenuation difference
attributes.description: Difference in mean attenuation of the liver and spleen on non-contrast CT

attributes.name: Liver noncontrast CT attenuation mean
attributes.description: Mean attenuation of all voxels of the segmented liver on non-contrast CT

attributes.name: Liver noncontrast CT attenuation median
attributes.description: Median attenuation of all voxels of the segmented liver on non-contrast CT

attributes.name: Liver noncontrast CT attenuation maximum
attributes.description: Maximum attenuation of all voxels of the segmented liver on non-contrast CT

attributes.name: Liver noncontrast CT attenuation minimum
attributes.description: Minimum attenuation of all voxels of the segmented liver on non-contrast CT

attributes.name: Liver noncontrast CT attenuation skewness
attributes.description: Skewness of attenuation of all voxels of the segmented liver on non-contrast CT

attributes.name: Liver elongation
attributes.description: The elongation of the livers shape computed as the ratio of the largest principal moment to the smallest principal moment

attributes.name: Liver Feret diameter
attributes.description: The diameter in physical units cm of the sphere that includes all the segmented liver

attributes.name: Liver ellipsoid major axis length
attributes.description: Length of the major axis of the ellipsoid with the same volume as the liver IBSITDIC

attributes.name: Liver ellipsoid minor axis length
attributes.description: Length of the minor axis of the ellipsoid of the same volume as the liver IBSIPV91

attributes.name: Spleen elongation
attributes.description: The elongation of the spleen computed as the ratio of the largest principal moment to the smallest principal moment

attributes.name: Spleen Feret diameter
attributes.description: The diameter in physical units cm of the sphere that includes all the segmented spleen

attributes.name: Spleen ellipsoid major axis length
attributes.description: Length of the major axis of the ellipsoid with the same volume as the spleen

attributes.name: Spleen ellipsoid minor axis length
attributes.description: Length of the minor axis of the ellipsoid of the same volume as the spleen IBSIP9VJ

attributes.name: Spleen ellipsoid least axis length
attributes.description: Length of the shortest axis of the ellipsoid of the same volume as the spleen IBSI7J51

attributes.name: Spleen spherical radius
attributes.description: The equivalent radius of the sphere of the same volume as the spleen

attributes.name: Spleen roundness
attributes.description: The ratio of the spherical radius and area of the spleen

attributes.name: Liver volume
attributes.description: Volume of the segmented liver

attributes.name: Spleen volume
attributes.description: Volume of the segmented spleen

attributes.name: Abdomen subcutaneous fat volume
attributes.description: Volume of abdominal subcutaneous fat

index_codes.display: morphometric ct quantification of liver, spleen, and abdominal fat
